answers.answer: I heard another lady on here say the same thing. It must depend on your dr office or I'd call and explain your concern with your loss early on.. Ect.. I had 2 MC last year and went to my OB at 5wks pregnant.. They did HCG panel and had me come back two days later to make sure it was rising. I was also placed on Progestrone just in case my last MC were due to low progestrone levels and tested for urine culture and gestational diabetes (bc I had that with my 3yr old daughter) I'm scheduled for my 8wk ultrasound tomorrow just to make sure all is going ok. I hear your frustration, I'd definitely would call to share your concern and know it doesn't hurt to get some answers to have you feel less worrisome.

question: I am 6 weeks and 3 days. My first docs appointment isnt till 11 weeks. (2nd time around,  1st time I miscarried) is this normal to be scheduled out this far? The lady who scheduled my appointment made me feel like just another notch on the belt. Any info would be helpful.
title: First Docs Appt.
